title: Man in the Muira (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Man in the Muira (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Drew opens the show recapping his second experience singing our nation's anthem, and marvels over how much easier new things are after trying them once. Adam explains how this is part of the process of learning, and how to use that for problem solving using a recent example from his car shop.  Drew asks Adam to tell him about the infamous three way stop incident prompting Adam's method for responding to inexplicable hatred. Finally, the guys go to the phones where they speak to one caller who is looking to drop out of college and another who struggles with consequences.
